nodes.text: Star Wars Read-Along Storybook and CD Treasury

The Star Wars Read-Along Storybook and CD Treasury is a hardcover compilation of three Star Wars original trilogy young-reader audio storybooks: Episode IV: A New Hope Read-Along Storybook and CD, Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back Read-Along Storybook and CD, and Episode VI: Return of the Jedi Read-Along Storybook and CD. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press in September 2015.
